Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis dropped the game-winning basket over Bam Adebayo in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Heat struggled in the third quarter, being outscored 37-17 despite having a 15-point lead at the start of the quarter
Free throw struggles continued to be costly, with the Heat shooting 71.6% compared to their usual 80.8%
Pelle Larsson finished with 13 points, two rebounds, and two assists on 66.7% shooting and 60% from three-point range
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kevin Love is expected to return and help with rebounding woes
Jaime Jaquez Jr. averages a career-high 7.6 rebounds
